title: Stuck on reconnect game
body: I finished a match around 30 minutes ago, and have not gotten past the reconnect screen as the game is apparently still in progress. I have done a full repair, restarted my PC and network, tried connecting via mobile network using mobile tethering, but nothing has worked. Suggestions?

replies.body: The response from Schittdawgg is pretty much where we're at at the moment - we're aware of the problem and we're trying to find a solution. Unfortunately, the root cause for this one is proving to be hard to diagnose - we'll keep you updated in [this thread.](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/Ve3mfZ7I-reconnect-to-game-issue-september-26)

Just got this back

We're aware of the issue where players are stuck in trying to reconnect to a game and are working hard to get it fixed. Regrettably, I'm unable to provide an estimate for the completion date at this time. It sounds like you just experienced what we refer to as a "ghost game". This happens when the game server you were playing on fails to communicate the game-end message to the client. This issue holds the account in limbo and you may not be able to play until it's released.

The 'limbo' will last typically 2-3 hours to give the server a chance to resync itself but it can go a bit longer. It's likely that we will not be able to recover the stats (LP/IP) for the game that was affected. Please refer to the server status page for more up-to-date details on the situation:

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce
